channel.title: FinOps on Automaly
channel.description: Recent content in FinOps on Automaly
channel.managingEditor: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
channel.webMaster: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)

item.title: Using XppPrePostArgs to pass parameters through a method
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Master XppPrePostArgs class in Dynamics 365 for passing parameters between pre- and post-event handlers. Practical example with CustGroup table extension and method wrapping.

item.title: How to hide New and Delete buttons (command buttons) in form
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Hide New and Delete buttons in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations forms using design properties or X++ code. Includes CoC extension examples for standard form customization.

item.title: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce - Component Overview
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Visual overview of Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce architecture and component structure. Understand the key components and their relationships in the Commerce ecosystem.

item.title: Microsoft ecosystem supporting Dynamics 365 Finance
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Visual diagram showing the comprehensive Microsoft ecosystem and technologies that support Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations. Understand integration points and supporting services.

item.title: Visual Studio Tips for Dynamics 365 Finance Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Essential Visual Studio configuration tips for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations development. Optimize your development environment with best practices, build settings, and custom toolbars.

item.title: A comparison between Dynamics 365 Finance & Dynamics 365 Business Central
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Detailed comparison of Dynamics 365 Finance & Supply Chain Management vs Business Central. Choose the right Microsoft ERP solution based on company size, features, and business requirements.

item.title: Filtering options Dynamics 365 Finance Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Master all filtering options in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations including Filter Pane, QuickFilter, and grid column filtering. Comprehensive guide with filter expressions and advanced techniques.

item.title: Extend on-hand inventory entities FinOps
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Extend on-hand inventory entities in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations by adding custom fields to tables, views, and entities. Step-by-step guide for inventory integration customization.

item.title: Reservation and on-hand inventory in warehouse management
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide to inventory reservation hierarchies and on-hand calculations in Dynamics 365 warehouse management. Covers reservation strategies, implementation details, and X++ APIs for WHS-enabled items.

item.title: How to get FinOps Azure storage blob connection string
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Retrieve Azure storage connection strings in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations using X++ CloudInfrastructure class. Essential for integrations, file operations, and understanding cloud storage architecture.

item.title: Date time function Dynamics 365 Finance Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Essential X++ date and time functions for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations development. Code snippets for string conversion, date comparisons, and time zone handling.

item.title: File upload sysoperation
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete X++ code examples for implementing file upload functionality in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations using SysOperation framework. Supports CSV and Excel file processing with batch capabilities.

item.title: Deploy SSRS reports in Dynamics 365 Finance, SCM using Powershell
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Deploy SSRS reports to Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations environments using PowerShell scripts. Automate report deployment for all reports or specific reports with DeployAllReportsToSSRS script.

item.title: Testing Dynamics 365 Finance Database Movement API with Postman
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Test Dynamics 365 Finance Database Movement APIs using Postman with complete authentication setup and examples. Learn to list backups, refresh databases, and export data programmatically.

item.title: A good example of Trace Parser, Visual Studio and Excel
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Real-world troubleshooting example using Trace Parser, Visual Studio, and Excel to solve Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations issues. Complete methodology for analyzing duplicate record errors and SQL traces.

item.title: A good tip of using Excel to analyse INSERT INTO statement captured in a Trace file
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Practical tip for using Excel to analyze INSERT INTO statements from D365 Finance Operations trace files for better SQL debugging and troubleshooting.

item.title: How to upgrade to Visual Studio 2017, .NET 4.7.2 for PU36/10.0.12 and higher
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Upgrade Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations development environments to Visual Studio 2017 and .NET 4.7.2 for PU36/10.0.12 compatibility. Step-by-step guide for cloud-hosted environment upgrades.

item.title: Dynamics 365 FinOps Data Integration using Microsoft Forms (Part 1)
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to integrate Microsoft Forms with Dynamics 365 Finance Operations using Power Automate and Data Entities for streamlined data collection and processing.

item.title: Database Sync after data type on field has been changed
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Troubleshooting guide for resolving database synchronization errors in D365 Finance Operations when field data types have been changed.

item.title: Set up a VHD for finance and operations apps
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide for setting up and configuring OneBox VHD virtual machines for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations development environments.

item.title: Azure Storage Emulator 'Port conflict with existing application', Dynamics 365 finance and operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Troubleshooting guide for resolving Azure Storage Emulator port conflicts in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations OneBox environments with step-by-step solutions.

item.title: Create Purchase Orders - Confirm - Product receipt - Post using X++ in Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete X++ code example for automating purchase order lifecycle in D365 Finance Operations including creation, confirmation, receipt, and posting processes.

item.title: Dynamics 365 Finance Operations upgrade questionaire
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive questionnaire for assessing AX 2012 to Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations upgrade projects including organization structure and customizations analysis.

item.title: Dynamics 365 finance and operations ODATA consuming - Length cannot be less than zero
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Troubleshooting guide for resolving ‘Length cannot be less than zero’ error when consuming OData services from Dynamics 365 Finance Operations in .NET applications.

item.title: Enable Power BI Embedded in cloud hosted Dynamics 365 finance and operations 8.0 +
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Step-by-step guide for enabling Power BI Embedded integration in cloud-hosted Dynamics 365 Finance Operations 8.0+ environments including workspace configuration.

item.title: Consuming Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations OData services from .NET
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide for consuming D365 Finance and Operations OData services from .NET applications including authentication, service principal setup, and C# implementation.

item.title: Business events and HTTPs endpoint
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide to setting up Business Events with HTTPS endpoints in Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations using Azure Functions, AAD app registration, and Key Vault for secure webhook integration.

item.title: Insert multiple records in a single transaction using Odata from Postman
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to insert multiple records in a single OData batch request using Postman for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations integration.

item.title: Extend the standard reports in Dynamics 365 finance and operations (CustAccountStatementExt)
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete tutorial for extending standard Customer Account Statement reports in D365 Finance Operations using SSRS, COC extensions, and customization techniques.

item.title: Dynamics 365 for finance and operations database synchronization using command line
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to perform database synchronization in Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations using command line tools and d365fo.tools. Includes examples for both cloud-hosted and on-premises environments.

item.title: Exception Handling in Dynamics 365 For Finance and Operation
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide to exception handling in Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations using X++ including try-catch blocks, optimistic concurrency exceptions, UpdateConflict, deadlock handling, and best practices.

item.title: Management reporter in new AX, Dynamics 365 For Operation
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide to Management Reporter (Financial reports) in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations including balance sheet and income statement creation.

item.title: Understanding modifiedField() Table method in Dynamics 365 Finance Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to use the modifiedField() table method in D365 Finance Operations to handle field change events, with practical X++ code examples and best practices.
